participant_1.background:
I love listening to acoustic music, especially when I am with my daughter.
my nickname is bubblegum.
I am not the fittest person, but I run to stay healthy for my baby.
i like to pickle eggs.
I want to drive my truck to the mountains and get some alone time.

participant_2.background:
I have a mobile hanging above my baby's crib.
I like to have a place where I can fully immerse myself in my fantasy world.
I am proud of the creative projects I have made in my studio.
My favorite place to eat is the local diner, where the staff knows my name and the food is delicious.
I like drinking hot chocolate while I read my mermaid books.

content.text: I'm doing pretty well. How about yourself?
I'm doing well. I'm getting ready for a baby shower for my sister.
Oh that's exciting! I love baby showers.
Me too! I'm making a mobile for her baby.
That's really sweet. I love to make mobiles. I have a mobile hanging above my daughter's crib.
That's awesome! I'm not very crafty, but I'm trying to learn.
You should! It's really fun and relaxing.
I know! I've always wanted to learn how to knit.
Me too! I've tried a few times but I can't seem to get the hang of it.
Maybe we can take a knitting class together sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love that.
Great! We can make a mobile for our babies together.
That's a great idea! I can't wait.
